content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: USUBJID
      operator: is_not_unique_set
      value: DOMAIN
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0151
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: USUBJID must be unique across all studies
Outcome:
  Message: USUBJID is not unique within study
  Output Variables:
    - USUBJID
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Study
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0151
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across
                  all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Specification
                Section: '5.2'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - DM

json.Description: USUBJID must be unique across all studies

Outcome.Message: USUBJID is not unique within study

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.
